channel.title: Making Max Stat Level Cap Higher and Combat Max Cap Higher
channel.description: Can anyone tell me how to make the level caps higher on my 317 private server?

item.title: Making Max Stat Level Cap Higher and Combat Max Cap Higher
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[code]go to client.java then search for:[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

then near it, look for: [code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 99;[/code]

where it says lvl <=99; and return 99; just change them to the level you want.

Credits: http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=552 100% (and the people the poster mentioned on the credits)[/code][/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Making Max Stat Level Cap Higher and Combat Max Cap Higher
